## Validators.max() method

Creates validator function that validates control if its value is higher than max value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static max(max: number | null): ValidatorFn;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  max | number \| null | Max value that should be validated |

<b>Returns:</b>

ValidatorFn
